name: Sleeveless Ruffle Hem Midi Bodycon
description: Chic, body-hugging midi dress with a sleeveless design and ruffled hem, combining vintage Y2K vibes for a trendy, flattering look.

name: Ruched Tie Shoulder Cami
description: Chic, sleeveless cami dress featuring ruched detailing and delicate tie shoulder straps. The two-layer hem adds a playful, textured touch to this stylish midi-length piece, perfect for casual outings or evening events.

name: White Long Sleeve Formal
description: This elegant knee-length dress features long sleeves and a sophisticated design, perfect for formal events like weddings or proms. Its timeless style is ideal for evening occasions, offering a refined and graceful silhouette.
